doctor_utters: [ask] How may I help you today?
[ask] Do you have difficulty breathing or shortness of breath?
[ask] Do you feel pain? If yes, where is the pain located?
[ask] Did you have any respiratory diseases before?
[ask] Have you been in contact with many people or people of similar symptoms before?
[inform] Based on your symptoms, the most likely diagnosis is Bronchitis.
patient_utters: Yes, I am experiencing shortness of breath.
Yes, I have a cough that produces colored or more abundant sputum than usual.
Yes, I feel pain. The pain is located on the side of my chest, my pharynx, my right and left breast, and my right posterior chest wall.
Yes, I have a chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD).
No, I have not been in contact with many people or people of similar symptoms before.
